verses.verse: וְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> And when David עָבַ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> past מְעַט֙ <S%H4592><s%> was a little מֵֽהָרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the top וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold צִיבָ֛א <S%H6717><s%> [of the hill] behold Ziba נַ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> the servant מְפִי־ בֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H4648><s%> of Mephibosheth לִקְרָאת֑וֹ <S%H7122><s%> met וְצֶ֨מֶד <S%H6776><s%> him with a couple חֲמֹרִ֜ים <S%H2543><s%> of asses חֲבֻשִׁ֗ים <S%H2280><s%> saddled וַעֲלֵיהֶם֩ <S%H5921><s%> and on מָאתַ֨יִם <S%H3967><s%> and upon them two hundred לֶ֜חֶם <S%H3899><s%> [loaves] of bread וּמֵאָ֧ה <S%H3967><s%> and an hundred צִמּוּקִ֛ים <S%H6778><s%> bunches of raisins וּמֵ֥אָה <S%H3967><s%> and an hundred קַ֖יִץ <S%H7019><s%> of summer fruits וְנֵ֥בֶל <S%H5035><s%> and a bottle יָֽיִן׃ <S%H3196><s%> of wine

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to צִיבָ֖א <S%H6717><s%> unto Ziba מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another לָּ֑ךְ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said צִ֠יבָא <S%H6717><s%> What meanest thou by these? And Ziba הַחֲמוֹרִ֨ים <S%H2543><s%> The asses לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> household הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [be] for the king's לִרְכֹּ֗ב <S%H7392><s%> to ride on [וּלְהַלֶּחֶם כ] (וְהַלֶּ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread ק) וְהַקַּ֙יִץ֙ <S%H7019><s%> and summer fruit לֶאֱכ֣וֹל <S%H398><s%> to eat הַנְּעָרִ֔ים <S%H5288><s%> for the young men וְהַיַּ֕יִן <S%H3196><s%> and the wine לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת <S%H8354><s%> may drink הַיָּעֵ֖ף <S%H3287><s%> that such as be faint בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king וְאַיֵּ֖ה <S%H346><s%> and where בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted אֲדֹנֶ֑יךָ <S%H113><s%> And where [is] thy master's וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said צִיבָ֜א <S%H6717><s%> Ziba אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> Behold he abideth בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> for he said הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> To day יָשִׁ֤יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> restore לִי֙ בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> shall the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מַמְלְכ֥וּת <S%H4468><s%> me the kingdom אָבִֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> of my father

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king לְצִבָ֔א <S%H6717><s%> to Ziba הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold לְךָ֔ כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לִמְפִי־ בֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H4648><s%> Behold thine [are] all that [pertained] unto Mephibosheth וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said צִיבָא֙ <S%H6717><s%> And Ziba הִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֵ֔יתִי <S%H7812><s%> I humbly אֶמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> beseech thee [that] I may find חֵ֥ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight אֲדֹנִ֥י <S%H113><s%> my lord הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> O king

וּבָ֛א <S%H935><s%> came הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And when king דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בַּֽחוּרִ֑ים <S%H980><s%> to Bahurim וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold מִשָּׁם֩ <S%H8033><s%> there אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man יוֹצֵ֜א <S%H3318><s%> behold thence came out מִמִּשְׁפַּ֣חַת <S%H4940><s%> of the family בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וּשְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> whose name שִׁמְעִ֣י <S%H8096><s%> [was] Shimei בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גֵּרָ֔א <S%H1617><s%> of Gera יֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> he came forth יָצ֖וֹא <S%H3318><s%> still as he came וּמְקַלֵּֽל׃ <S%H7043><s%> and cursed

וַיְסַקֵּ֤ל <S%H5619><s%> And he cast בָּֽאֲבָנִים֙ <S%H68><s%> stones אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> at David וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַבְדֵ֖י <S%H5650><s%> and at all the servants הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and all the people וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַגִּבֹּרִ֔ים <S%H1368><s%> and all the mighty men מִימִינ֖וֹ <S%H3225><s%> [were] on his right hand וּמִשְּׂמֹאלֽוֹ׃ <S%H8040><s%> and on his left

וְכֹֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> And thus said שִׁמְעִ֖י <S%H8096><s%> Shimei בְּקַֽלְל֑וֹ <S%H7043><s%> when he cursed צֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> Come out צֵ֛א <S%H3318><s%> come out אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man הַדָּמִ֖ים <S%H1818><s%> thou bloody וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and thou man הַבְּלִיָּֽעַל׃ <S%H1100><s%> of Belial

הֵשִׁיב֩ <S%H7725><s%> hath returned עָלֶ֨יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD כֹּ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּמֵ֣י <S%H1818><s%> upon thee all the blood בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whose מָלַ֙כְתָּ֙ <S%H4427><s%> in whose stead thou hast reigned [תַּחְתֹּו כ] (תַּחְתָּ֔יו <S%H8478><s%> Thahash ק) וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> hath delivered יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּלוּכָ֔ה <S%H4410><s%> the kingdom בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand אַבְשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H53><s%> of Absalom בְּנֶ֑ךָ <S%H1121><s%> thy son וְהִנְּךָ֙ <S%H2005><s%> behold בְּרָ֣עָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H7451><s%> and behold thou [art taken] in thy mischief כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> are a אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man דָּמִ֖ים <S%H1818><s%> because thou [art] a bloody אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֲבִישַׁ֤י <S%H52><s%> Abishai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְרוּיָה֙ <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why יְקַלֵּ֞ל <S%H7043><s%> curse הַכֶּ֤לֶב <S%H3611><s%> dog הַמֵּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> Why should this dead הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> my lord הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king אֶעְבְּרָה־ <S%H5674><s%> over נָּ֖א <S%H4994><s%> now וְאָסִ֥ירָה <S%H5493><s%> I pray thee and take off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> his head ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לִּ֥י וְלָכֶ֖ם בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> What have I to do with you ye sons צְרֻיָ֑ה <S%H6870><s%> Zeruiah [כִּי כ] (כֹּ֣ה <S%H3588><s%> for ק) יְקַלֵּ֗ל <S%H7043><s%> unto him Curse [וְכִי כ] (כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for ק) יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> because the LORD אָ֤מַר <S%H559><s%> hath said לוֹ֙ קַלֵּ֣ל <S%H7043><s%> Curse אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> any יֹאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> Who shall then say מַדּ֖וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why עָשִׂ֥יתָה <S%H6213><s%> Wherefore hast thou done so כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> after that ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲבִישַׁי֙ <S%H52><s%> to Abishai וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> and to all his servants הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold בְנִ֛י <S%H1121><s%> Behold my son אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> which came forth מִמֵּעַ֖י <S%H4578><s%> of my bowels מְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> seeketh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> my life וְאַ֨ף <S%H637><s%> how כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עַתָּ֜ה <S%H6258><s%> now בֶּן־ הַיְמִינִ֗י <S%H1145><s%> how much more now [may this] Benjamite הַנִּ֤חוּ <S%H3240><s%> [do it]? let him alone לוֹ֙ וִֽיקַלֵּ֔ל <S%H7043><s%> and let him curse כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> hath bidden ל֖וֹ יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD

אוּלַ֛י <S%H194><s%> Perhaps יִרְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> will look יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> It may be that the LORD [בְּעֳוֹנִי כ] (בְּעֵינִ֑י <S%H5771><s%> fault ק) וְהֵשִׁ֨יב <S%H7725><s%> will requite יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> and that the LORD לִי֙ טוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> me good תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> instead קִלְלָת֖וֹ <S%H7045><s%> for his cursing הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went along דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> And as David וַאֲנָשָׁ֖יו <S%H376><s%> and his men בַּדָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way ס וְשִׁמְעִ֡י <S%H8096><s%> Shimei הֹלֵךְ֩ <S%H1980><s%> as he went בְּצֵ֨לַע <S%H6763><s%> side הָהָ֜ר <S%H2022><s%> on the hill's לְעֻמָּת֗וֹ <S%H5980><s%> over against הָלוֹךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיְקַלֵּ֔ל <S%H7043><s%> him and cursed וַיְסַקֵּ֤ל <S%H5619><s%> and threw בָּֽאֲבָנִים֙ <S%H68><s%> stones לְעֻמָּת֔וֹ <S%H5980><s%> at וְעִפַּ֖ר <S%H6080><s%> him and cast בֶּעָפָֽר׃ <S%H6083><s%> dust פ

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> that [were] with him came הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> for עֲיֵפִ֑ים <S%H5889><s%> weary וַיִּנָּפֵ֖שׁ <S%H5314><s%> and refreshed שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וְאַבְשָׁל֗וֹם <S%H53><s%> And Absalom וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> came יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem וַאֲחִיתֹ֖פֶל <S%H302><s%> and Ahithophel אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> now it

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בָּ֞א <S%H935><s%> was come חוּשַׁ֧י <S%H2365><s%> And it came to pass when Hushai הָאַרְכִּ֛י <S%H757><s%> the Archite רֵעֶ֥ה <S%H7463><s%> friend דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David's אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H53><s%> unto Absalom וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said חוּשַׁי֙ <S%H2365><s%> that Hushai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְשָׁלֹ֔ם <S%H53><s%> unto Absalom יְחִ֥י <S%H2421><s%> God save הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king יְחִ֥י <S%H2421><s%> God save הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <S%H53><s%> And Absalom אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חוּשַׁ֔י <S%H2365><s%> to Hushai זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> is this חַסְדְּךָ֖ <S%H2617><s%> [Is] this thy kindness אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for רֵעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7453><s%> brother לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> how long לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָלַ֖כְתָּ <S%H1980><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for רֵעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7453><s%> brother

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said חוּשַׁי֮ <S%H2365><s%> And Hushai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְשָׁלֹם֒ <S%H53><s%> unto Absalom לֹ֕א <S%H3808><s%> No כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> For אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom בָּחַ֧ר <S%H977><s%> choose יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Nay but whom the LORD וְהָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel [לֹא כ] (לֹ֥ו <S%H3808><s%> No ק) אֶהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become וְאִתּ֥וֹ <S%H854><s%> for אֵשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> his will I be and with him will I abide
